column1: Smoque BBQ////Lineup to get in the door built some anticipation
column2: didn't really like the menu structure but the food was really good. As usual with a BBQ place
column3: ordered too much and paid for it the next day. Had the brisket platter with the taste of pulled pork
column5: and sausage - decided to have the 1/2 and 1/2 sliced & chopped brisket
column6: would def recommend. It ended up being really
column7: really tasty but it was too much food. Great service
column8: the staff was really awesome and super helpful. Above all
column9: would definitely recommend the bread pudding for dessert - so good. Had the menu ordering structure been more friendly
column10: would have given a five star
